txt.en: 'The creature within this fortress is a being of great evil. Yrjänä seems to know the name of this creature and has gone further into the fortress to confront it.\n\n'Find Yrjänä! He cannot fight this foe by himself! We cannot lose our chieftain. You and your allies must oppose the evil here and fight in his stead.'

'[placeholder]! For what reason have you come to the Isle of Death?'

Yrjänä listens to your tale, and he nods in understanding.

'Yes, this creature that has come to Sâri-surma is the gaunt-lord Drugoth. He brings fear in his train, but there is something else: I think madness has taken him.'
'The Lossoth cannot lose Yrjänä. We would be lost without our chieftain. You must find him and keep him from fighting the evil creature that lives now on this Isle of Death!'
In the depths of the fortress on Sâri-surma, the Lossoth are trying to end the threat of Drugoth the Death-monger.
Yrjänä is somewhere within the fortress on Sâri-surma.\n\nPirita has asked you to find the Lossoth chieftain, Yrjänä, within the depths of the fortress.
